name: Encompass Digital Media
overview: Encompass Digital Media Inc. owns and operates broadcast facilities in Los Angeles and Atlanta. It offers network channel origination services, such as master control and engineering, automation systems, on-air graphics, quality control, satellite/fiber/IPTV distribution, satellite platforms, network backhauls/live insertions via teleport, and disaster recovery. The company also provides centralcasting services, including ingest and QC of customer medial; redundant playout architecture supported by UPS and diesel power generator; dedicated fiber transmission with satellite backup; live event switching and break rolls; monitoring; FCC emergency alert compliance; and retransmit D2 feeds. In addition, it offers distribution and delivery services, which include satellite uplink trucks, fiber network, end-to-end backhaul coordination, IP via satellite, and equipment collocation; and government solutions, such as SATCOM, disaster recovery, rapid deployment, mobile units, VOD, and production studios, as well as IP voice, data, and video. Further, the company provides digital media services, which include digital media infrastructure and media manipulation services; and cable neighborhood platform, digital media encoding, emergency communication, and video production services. It serves networks and broadcasters, sports leagues and broadcasters, and general entertainment cable channels, television stations, cable and satellite entities, and government. Encompass Digital Media Inc. was formerly known as Broadcast Facilities, Inc. The company was incorporated in 2007 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

milestones.description: Encompass Digital Media to Acquire Content Distribution Business from Ascent Media Corporation
milestones.source_description: Encompass Digital Media to Acquire Content Distribution Business from Ascent Media Corporation
